text: Ia Kantrin Igharazibar otivir gumaziba, ia kamaghɨn fo, Judaba, uan gumazibar mɨkarzir mogomebar aghori. Egha me kamaghɨn ia dɨbori, ia gumazir mɨkarzir mogomebar aghorir puvatɨziba. Arazir kam kamakɨn, gumaziba uari uan mɨkarzir mogomebar aghori. Eghtɨ ia deravɨra nɨghnɨgh, ia fomɨra Kantrin Igharazibar Gumazibar mɨn ike.
